original_text: The wheels were like the wheels of a chariot. Hiram used bronze to make the axles and all the parts of the wheels.
korean_text: 그 바퀴의 구조는 병거 바퀴의 구조 같은데 그 축과 테와 살과 통이 다 부어 만든 것이며

sentences.original_text: The wheels were like the wheels of a chariot
Hiram used bronze to make the axles
and all the parts of the wheels
